E

ElementBody - Class in com.mygdx.game.controller
ElementBody is class that creates keeps information about the body and fixtures of the entity. it has the methods to create the fixtures of the body and defines it's type and position.
ElementBody(World, ElementModel, BodyDef.BodyType) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.controller.ElementBody
Constructor that defines a body, sets it's position and type and adds it it's data(model).
ElementModel - Class in com.mygdx.game.model
ElementModel is a class that contain the coordinates of the element, methods to update its position and the types of object the element can be.
ElementModel(float, float) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.model.ElementModel
Constructor of the class that set the position of the element with the coordinates given.
ElementModel.ModelType - Enum in com.mygdx.game.model
Types of element the element can be.
ElementView - Class in com.mygdx.game.view
ElementView is a class that deals with the view of each element, containing its sprite and animation and methods to update them.
ElementView() - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.view.ElementView
 
endContact(Contact) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
ContactListener implementation method.
EnemyModel - Class in com.mygdx.game.model
EnemyModel class deals with with the state of the enemy, its health points, its removal flag and its behaviour, updating its position.
EnemyModel(float, float, BehaviourModel) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.model.EnemyModel
Constructor of the class, it sets the coordinates, health points and behaviour of the enemy.
EnemyView - Class in com.mygdx.game.view
EnemyView is a class that deals with the view of each of the enemy entities, containing methods to update their view.
EnemyView(Downwell) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.view.EnemyView
Constructor of the class, it calls the method to create the sprite and animation.
